title: How to get Prizes for a Tournament?
body:
I went through steps of making a "fake" (didn't submit it) one here http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/ but couldn't find any step or checkbox that would indicate if I could get RP prizes from Riot or not.

Trying to figure out, How to make a tournament with RP prizes from Riot.

replies.body: Once you submit a real tournament, it will be reviewed and then either approved or declined for prizing. If it is declined we will let you know why so you can fix it up and resubmit.

I thought as much, But the problem I had with that is, I hope this doesn't come across as cynical or something negative, But the idea of doing it through the official "events" is solely to get the RP prizes.

To get more people to show up and make the event better and so on, I don't want to get an official "event" approved without prizes. (More malleability to just do it unofficially)

So is it possible to keep revising it until it's appropriate for the RP prizes? and not get locked into doing it until approved for RP prizes?
For it to get approved by us you mainly need all the details locked down. Date, time, schedule, format, location, rules, event page. You don't need to start advertising the event.
